description: Example to use strings in JS from C WASM

scripts.build: rm -f build/types.wasm && emcc src/types.c -s ONLY_MY_CODE=1 -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_getTen', '_add', '_mult', '_getTenPointZeroOne', '_addFloats', '_getString', '_echoString', '_getTrue', '_getFalse', '_echoBoolean', '_negate', '_or']"  -o build/types.wasm
